description: Elementipelago is yet another alchemy game, but custom made to work with Archipelago.

v0.1.1-alpha.description:
# This release is no longer supported

- Assets are now embedded in binary

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/compare/v0.1.0-alpha...v0.1.1-alpha
v0.1.1-alpha.title: v0.1.1-alpha

v0.2.0-alpha.description:
## What's Changed
* fix: Inconsistent scrolling speeds on different machines by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/9
* feat: Automatic atlas location parsing by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/11
* feat: cache datapackages per game by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/12
* feat: Server side save loading by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/10
* Update README.md by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/14
* feat: Improved drawer dragging by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/15
* feat: add support for the new compounds_are_ingredients option by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/17
* Html by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/19
* Html by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/20
* write a basic README by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/21
* Update README.md by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/22
* fix: login form not setting slotdata by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/24
* feat: Polish by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/23
* feat: Add z-ordering in a sensible way by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/25
* feat: add icons to the elements that get spawned as well by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/26
* feat: working login errors by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/33
* feat: favicon by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/32
* chore: deploy script by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/31
* chore: build sprites cmd in bun by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/30
* feat: more sprites by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/28
* docs: add short section on how to play by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/37
* feat: refactor + polish by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/38
* fix: mobile scrolling by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/39
* fix: tweak responsive breakpoints by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/40
* feat: keep track of mounted elements by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/41
* fix: deploy script by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/42
* fix: build due to import that shouldn't be there by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/43
* feat: searchbar by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/46
* fix: dragging animation by using index to compare instead of self by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/44
* Icon cache by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/45
* feat: player and game names by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/48
* move favicon to png by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/47
* feat: improve dragging functionality and bounding boxes by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/49
* feat: improved drawer layout + search by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/51
* feat: sfx by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/52
* fix: when a new item was received it wasn't stored in the icon cache by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/53
* fix: element parent hitbox blocking click events for underlying elements by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/54
* fix: element pickup offset bug by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/55
* fix: icon inconcistency in drawer by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/56
* feat: collapse element names in playfield by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/57
* feat: style + formatting for compounds by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/58
* refactor: store overhaul and code migration by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/60
* fix: graph not initialized by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/61
* chore: update pkg versions by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/62
* fix: use md5 for icon selection by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/63
* feat: status icons by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/64
* feat: better scrollbars by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/65
* feat: better sorting by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/66
* feat: Add craft all Intermediate goal condition by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/70
* feat: toast messages by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/71
* fix: add missing files to vcs by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/72
* fix: outdated search field keys by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/73
* chore: create license by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/76
* chore: add github action to add the latest apworld to releases by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/77
* chore: new readme by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/78
* fix: check for goal on connect as well, in case it didn't work by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/74
* chore: add github action to add the latest apworld to releases by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/79
* ci: fix uploading the apworld to the release by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/80

## New Contributors
* @peppidesu made their first contribution in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/9

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/compare/v0.1.1-alpha...v0.2.0-alpha
v0.2.0-alpha.title: v0.2.0-alpha

v1.0.0.description:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* docs: updated readme by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/110
* ci: Automatic release notes format + autolabel by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/108
* fix: invisible toast when receiving upgrades by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/113
* fix: support upgrades for received items storage by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/114
* fix: relevant error when connection without protocol prefix fails by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/120
* fix: apworld version check by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/117
* fix: auto deselect on drag by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/122
* chore: expand credits by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/121


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/compare/v1.0.0-rc2...v1.0.0
v1.0.0.title: v1.0.0

v1.0.0-rc1.description:
## What's Changed
* feat: random names for starting elements and intermediates by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/82
* fix: names when crafting with intermediates by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/84
* style: prettierrc file by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/85
* chore: bump packages by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/86
* feat: add a placeholder element by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/87
* fix: mount correct element from drawer by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/89
* feat: chat window & tray by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/90
* feat!: Progressive Filter upgrade by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/81
* feat!: Add progressive field size as filler by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/88
* feat: settings by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/91
* feat: add hints tab by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/92
* feat: tray icons by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/93
* feat: Redo the void icon by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/94
* better toasts by @peppidesu in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/96
* feat: change title to elementipelago, change connect button by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/98
* feat: add a download button to login by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/97
* feat: generate name based on random name instead of internal name by @itepastra in https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/95


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/compare/v0.2.0-alpha...v1.0.0-rc1
v1.0.0-rc1.title: v1.0.0-rc1

v1.0.0-rc2.description:
## What's Changed

- fix: credit links styled incorrectly by @peppidesu in <https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/100>
- fix: use the cached icon in toasts by @itepastra in <https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/101>
- feat: add some sprites by @itepastra in <https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/104>
- fix: dynamic viewport sizing for mobile use by @itepastra in <https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/pull/107>

**Full Changelog**: <https://github.com/peppidesu/elementipelago/compare/v1.0.0-rc1...v1.0.0-rc2>
